message.body: I heard a rumor and I wanted to know if it was true...
I heard you were going with me to Montana... is that true?
Of course! I heard you needed a companion!
I want to leave super early to avoid the hopscotch at the house... can I pour you into the truck at 5:00 am... I promise Starbucks and any other treats you desire!
Haha dad said you were leaving at 4 am so I think we will manage I'm your puppet whatever you want
Sweet! We need to listen to some killer tunes on the drive...
I've been searching for my commitments cd
I can honestly say my CDs consist of the CDs of my child hood like back street boys and billy gillman
